body.name: REAHOME 9 Drawer Dresser for Bedroom Chest of Drawers Closets Large Capacity Organizer Fabric Storage Tower Steel Frame Wooden Top Living Room Entryway Office (Black Grey)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 46 mins
features: ✩[Easy to Assemble] Black dresser size : 39.0’’L x 11.8’’W x 39.4’’H. With free installation tools and detailed instructions, it can be easily assembled in just 20 minutes! This chest of drawers can be used in multiple rooms, ideal for closets, bedrooms, living room, hallway college dorm, office, etc.

✩[Quality Durable Construction] The sturdy steel frame and durable MDF wooden waterproof countertop provide reliable strength and stability, and are durable. Adjustable feet can be used on non-inclined ground to increase stability and protect against scratches on the floor. The "X" lacing at the back increases the stability of the product.

✩[Multi-Function Storage] 9 fabric drawers in 2 sizes for easy sorting and storage. Drawers are great for organizing your clothes, blankets, scarves, socks and other accessories. Wood top provides a hard surface to place lamps, books, decor, and more.

✩[Practical and Portable] Elegant wooden handle on drawers for opening and closing more easily. The front side is made of cationic materials, and all other sides and gaps are made of high-quality breathable non-woven synthetic fibers. Wipe clean with a damp cloth and air dry for easy maintenance.

☺[High Service] REAHOME: Simple and unfading life. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. Please rest assured and trust that our service team will provide you with a satisfactory solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about ordering this but read the reviews and decided to go for it. I’m so happy I did! We’re redoing our daughter’s bedroom and this goes so well with her new bed and fits well in her room. More clothes fit in it than I thought! It looks fresh and brightens the room. Love it! If you’re questioning it just get it. You won’t be disappointed! Item was packaged very well and protected . No issues putting it together. I did it myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy these pieces I am a renter. I do not need real wood or anything fancy in this season of my life. These match my bed frame well in color and it holds everything I want it to with ease.Please note because these are fabric and cardboard draws you can not stuff them. I'm an organizer and I can't stand when men do this. They get distorted and ugly. So if it can't fit find another way.These are for minimalists.They do have a smell but it does not transfer to clothes. They are sturdy and lightweight enough to move when vacuuming if you want to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Was originally planning to use this dresser to hold my TV on top but, after assembly it’s not particularly sturdy (especially on carpet). the assembly was super easy and i was able to do it without a second person in an hour or so. The only issue I have is with the fabric drawers. they don’t fit perfectly but, that’s more of a nitpick. the bigger issue is the buttons to pull the drawers out are connected by a small screw in between the drawer but, because the drawers are fabric the screws don’t hold very well. i’ve already had one of the buttons fall off the first week I had it. In terms of dressers, it does what it needs to but, if you’re willing to splurge on a nice dresser then this isn’t for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is an inexpensive "dresser" that looks decent, is sturdy enough and is relatively easy to assemble. I took off 1 star because the assembly instructions are not the easiest to understand. You have to be able to interpret pictures and visualize the assembled pieces to not accidentally install a piece backwards (which I did and had to re-do). However, once put together, it serves the purpose for which it is intended and looks quite nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for the entryway to store some living items. It fits right in with my other furniture, it was quite simple to assemble and came right on time. Definitely recommend for small spaces or as an alternative to the traditional wood dresser.For an Amazon product, this is a pretty decent item. Easy to assemble, it’s tall, and all the drawers are very nice. It’s no sturdy oak wood dresser, but it does the job and it’s very nice looking. It does come with an option to anchor it to the wall behind it.Overall excellent quality and value, well made and since is not bulky you can accommodate it anywhere, I’m extremely happy with my purchase.I really love it! I’m planning to buy another two for my big closet and family room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love that it actually looks like real wood I actually thought this was going to be real wood not reading the description very well however when I found out it wasn’t I thought I would be disappointed however I actually love the dresser it holds my 45 inch tv as well as fits a lot of my clothes I can say if you have a lotOf clothes this dresser might be small however my closet is big forExtra room if need to be

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, the only good thing I can say about this product is that it's nice to look at. Other than that, I can't really say anything positive about it. It's not sturdy at all. It's very top heavy, considering that the heaviest piece to the whole dresser is the flat board piece on top, that serves as the surface, or dresser top. It was fairly easy to put together, although the directions aren't very helpful. I was able to figure it out on my own. And I put it together myself. The dresser itself is fairly tall. I'm 5'3" tall and it comes to about middle of my chest. But it's also very narrow, therefore causing it to be unsteady. The drawers are somewhat flimsy, but they have a good depth to them. So you can store quite a bit in them, I just wouldn't put anything heavy in them. The knobs on the drawers are probably the best quality part of the whole thing. I honestly would not recommend this product to anyone. Especially if your looking for sturdiness, quality, and value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in addition to my regular dresser. I need more drawer space but didn’t wanna buy another dresser. This is perfect and very roomy. It was easy to put together as well. I was able to assemble it by myself. I would definitely recommend. I may buy another if I can get rid of this treadmill in my room lol
